page.title: 10DEVIL'S DYKE
page.content: Many years ago,a legend was told about how the{Devils Dyke}was made.The people living in Sussex at that time were very religious and the Devil was very angry about this.So he planned to dig a huge Dyke from the{Weald}to the coast.When the tide came in,the{Weald would be flooded.That night he set to work,using a big shovel and he had to finish by the morning.Meanwhile,an old widow woman couldn't sleep and she woke up and lit a candle and placed it on her window sill.The Devil saw this light and thought it was the sun rising so he threw down his shovel and rushed back to Hell.He never returned but there is a mound at the bottom of the Dyke where people say his shovel is buried.
